title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable x with the $$a+h$$. We get the expression $${\left(a+h\right)}^2+3\left(a+h\right)-4$$.

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression $${\left(a+h\right)}^2+3\left(a+h\right)-4$$. What do we get?
